name: 侯劭毅
objective: 分析化學包含物質組成的分離,確認與測定.定性分析旨在化學確認物質之物種,定量分析則在測定其含量.分離操作步驟在定性與定量分析中通常是必要的.
schedule:
week               contents
1                introdcution
2              the tools of analytical chemistry
3              statistical data
4              application of chemical equilibria
5              calculations in complex system
6              titration
7              neutralization titration
8             precipitation titration
9             mid-term exam.
10-12      electrochemical methods 
13-15      spectrochemical analysis
16-17      chromatography
18           final exam.
scorePolicy:
小考: 20%
期中考: 40%
期末考: 40%
